author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: خالِصَةً لِوَجْهِكَ وَمُسْتَقْرِبَةً إِلى حَرَمِ أَمْرِكَ وَكَعْبَةِ قُرْبِكَ، ثُمَّ قَدِّرْ لِي يا إِلهِي ما قَدَّرْتَهُ لِخِيْرَةِ إِمائكَ، ثُمَّ أَنْزِلْ عَلَيَّ ما يَسْتَضِيْءُ بِهِ وَجْهِي وَيَسْتَنِيرُ بِهِ صَدْرِيْ، وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ
translation: Cleanse me with the waters of Thy mercy, O my Lord, and make me wholly Thine, and cause me to approach the Tabernacle of Thy Cause and the adored Sanctuary of Thy Presence. Ordain, then, for me all the things Thou didst ordain for the chosen ones among Thy handmaidens, and rain down upon me that which will illuminate my face and enlighten my heart.
